app_info.title: Beacon of New Beginnings - Crisis Support
app_info.short_description: Safe haven support & resources for abuse survivors and homeless individuals.
app_info.full_description:
Beacon of New Beginnings provides critical support and resources for survivors of abuse and homelessness. Our app connects individuals to safety, healing services, and empowerment programs.

üõ°Ô∏è EMERGENCY RESOURCES
‚Ä¢ 24/7 crisis hotlines and emergency contacts
‚Ä¢ Immediate access to safe shelters and refuges
‚Ä¢ Emergency safety planning tools
‚Ä¢ Crisis intervention chat support
‚Ä¢ Location-based emergency services

üìö RESOURCE DIRECTORY
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive database of local support services
‚Ä¢ Domestic violence support organizations
‚Ä¢ Homelessness assistance programs
‚Ä¢ Legal aid and advocacy services
‚Ä¢ Mental health and counseling resources
‚Ä¢ Financial assistance programs
‚Ä¢ Job training and employment support

ü§ù COMMUNITY SUPPORT
‚Ä¢ Anonymous support groups and forums
‚Ä¢ Peer support networks
‚Ä¢ Healing and recovery programs
‚Ä¢ Educational workshops and resources
‚Ä¢ Survivor story sharing (optional)

üîí PRIVACY & SAFETY
‚Ä¢ Complete anonymity for basic app usage
‚Ä¢ Encrypted communications and data
‚Ä¢ No personal information required
‚Ä¢ Trauma-informed design principles
‚Ä¢ Quick exit feature for safety
‚Ä¢ Secure data storage and transmission

‚úÖ WHY CHOOSE BEACON OF NEW BEGINNINGS?
‚Ä¢ Created by survivors, for survivors
‚Ä¢ Verified and vetted resource providers
‚Ä¢ 24/7 availability and support
‚Ä¢ Multi-language accessibility
‚Ä¢ No cost barriers to access
‚Ä¢ Partnership with national crisis organizations
‚Ä¢ Trauma-informed user experience
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive safety features

üÜò CRISIS SERVICES
‚Ä¢ National Domestic Violence Hotline integration
‚Ä¢ Local crisis center connections
‚Ä¢ Emergency shelter locator
‚Ä¢ Safety planning assistance
‚Ä¢ Crisis text and chat support
‚Ä¢ Immediate danger response resources

üè† HOMELESSNESS SUPPORT
‚Ä¢ Shelter and housing resources
‚Ä¢ Food assistance programs
‚Ä¢ Healthcare access information
‚Ä¢ Social services navigation
‚Ä¢ Employment and benefits assistance
‚Ä¢ Mental health and substance abuse support

üì± KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Intuitive, accessible interface
‚Ä¢ Offline resource access
‚Ä¢ GPS-based service location
‚Ä¢ Multi-language support (English, Spanish)
‚Ä¢ Anonymous usage tracking for safety
‚Ä¢ Quick access to emergency contacts
‚Ä¢ Educational content library
‚Ä¢ Progress tracking for healing journey

üõ°Ô∏è SAFETY FIRST
‚Ä¢ All data encrypted and secure
‚Ä¢ No tracking or monitoring of users
‚Ä¢ Anonymous access to all basic features
‚Ä¢ Quick exit button for emergency situations
‚Ä¢ Secure communication channels
‚Ä¢ Privacy-focused design throughout

Download Beacon of New Beginnings today and take the first step toward safety, healing, and empowerment. You are not alone.

üåü Supporting thousands in their journey to safety and healing.
app_info.keywords: domestic violence, abuse support, crisis help, homelessness, safety, counseling, emergency, shelter, survivor resources, crisis intervention

content_rating_questionnaire.drugs_alcohol_tobacco: Educational content about substance abuse resources
content_rating_questionnaire.location_sharing: Yes - for finding nearby crisis resources only
content_rating_questionnaire.personal_info_sharing: Minimal - only if user chooses to contact services
content_rating_questionnaire.social_interaction: Yes - anonymous support groups and forums

location.purpose: Finding nearby crisis resources and shelters

security_practices.deletion_request_process: Contact support@beaconnewbeginnings.org or use in-app settings

internal_testing.test_instructions:
Beacon of New Beginnings Test Instructions:

IMPORTANT: This app deals with sensitive crisis support content. Please test respectfully.

1. Test anonymous access - no signup required
2. Browse resource directory by category
3. Test location-based resource finding
4. Test crisis support chat (connects to test environment)
5. Test community support groups (anonymous)
6. Test safety planning tools
7. Test quick exit feature (shake phone or tap emergency exit)
8. Test multi-language switching
9. Test offline resource access
10. Verify all external links work properly

Crisis Testing:
- All crisis numbers are real but marked as TEST MODE
- Community posts are moderated
- Location services are optional
- No personal data is collected by default

Safety Note: App is designed for vulnerable populations - maintain confidentiality during testing.
